::Shredder/Zardus::

Shredder laughs at Sinesis' last comments, ignoring Quickstrike.

"We don't need arrogant weaklings," He says insultingly as he puts away his 
gun.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus stops near a door. "This will serve as your quarters. You may take a 
tour of the ship if you want."

He walks off.
